com.google.enterprise.connector.spi

Interface TraversalSchedule


  • public interface TraversalSchedule
    A traversal schedule for a connector.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRetryDelay()
      Returns the number of seconds to delay after finding no new content.
      int getTraversalRate()
      Returns the target traversal rate in documents per minute.
      boolean inScheduledInterval()
      Returns true if the current time is within a scheduled traversal interval.
      boolean isDisabled()
      Returns true if the traversal schedule is disabled.
      int nextScheduledInterval()
      Returns the number of seconds until the next scheduled traversal interval.
      boolean shouldRun()
      Returns true if traversals could run at this time, equivalent to

    • Method Detail

      • getTraversalRate

        int getTraversalRate()
        Returns the target traversal rate in documents per minute.

      • getRetryDelay

        int getRetryDelay()
        Returns the number of seconds to delay after finding no new content.

      • isDisabled

        boolean isDisabled()
        Returns true if the traversal schedule is disabled.

      • inScheduledInterval

        boolean inScheduledInterval()
        Returns true if the current time is within a scheduled traversal interval.

      • nextScheduledInterval

        int nextScheduledInterval()
        Returns the number of seconds until the next scheduled traversal interval. A return value of 0 (zero) indicates the current time is within a scheduled traversal interval. A returned value of -1 indicates there is no next traversal interval.

      • shouldRun

        boolean shouldRun()
        Returns true if traversals could run at this time, equivalent to 
        !isDisabled() && inScheduledInterval()
        .
